mapper.insert:
insert into track_field ( uuid, simple_name, modifier, simple_type, init_value, class_uuid, class_name, file_name, file_path, package_name, module_name, package_uuid, start_commit, start_commit_date, end_commit, end_commit_date, repo_uuid, branch, version ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.simpleName}, #{item.modifier}, #{item.simpleType}, #{item.initValue}, #{item.classUuid}, #{item.className}, #{item.fileName}, #{item.filePath}, #{item.packageName}, #{item.moduleName}, #{item.packageUuid}, #{item.commonInfo.startCommit}, #{item.commonInfo.startCommitDate}, #{item.commonInfo.endCommit}, #{item.commonInfo.endCommitDate}, #{item.commonInfo.repoUuid}, #{item.commonInfo.branch}, #{item.trackerInfo.version} )

insert into raw_field ( uuid, simple_name, simple_type, modifier, init_value, class_uuid, field_uuid, version, change_relation, commitid, committer, commit_date, commit_message, parent_commit ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.simpleName}, #{item.modifier}, #{item.simpleType}, #{item.initValue}, #{item.classUuid}, #{item.trackerInfo.rootUUID}, #{item.trackerInfo.version}, #{item.trackerInfo.changeRelation}, #{item.commonInfo.commit}, #{item.commonInfo.committer}, #{item.commonInfo.commitDate}, #{item.commonInfo.commitMessage}, #{item.commonInfo.parentCommit} )
mapper.select: select version,uuid from track_field where file_path = #{filePath} and class_name = #{className} and simple_name = #{simpleName} order by version desc limit 1
